BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions
Comment: Jointly with the Subcommittee on Zoning and Franchises

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. C 070522 ZMM, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section 8d, changing from a M1-5 District to a C4-6 District and an M3-2 District to a C4-6 District.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Uniform Land Use Review Procedure application no. C 070530 (A) ZRM, pursuant to Section 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, Section 12-10, Section 23-144, Section 23-15, Section 23-922, Section, 24-161, Section 35-31 and Section 74-743.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. C 070523 (A) ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §201 of the Charter of the City of New York and proposed modification pursuant to Section 2-06 (c) (1) of the Uniform land Use Procedure, in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 4, for the grant of a special permit to Sections 74-743 (a) (2) and 74-743 (a) (6) (ii) of the Zoning Resolution in connection with a proposed mixed use development on property located at 616 First Avenue (Block 967, Lots 1). This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. C 070525 ZSM, pursuant to §197-c and §201 of the Charter of the City of New York for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Sections 13-562 and 74-52 of the Zoning Resolution in the Borough of Manhattan, Council District no. 4 to allow an attended public parking garage with a maximum capacity of 294 spaces located at 616 First Avenue (Block 967, Lot 1). This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
